title: How To Live on 24 Hours a Day
description: In How To Live on 24 Hours a Day, Arnold Bennett offers practical advice on how one might live (as opposed to just existing) within the confines of 24 hours a day.  This timeless classic was first published in 1908. It was a best-seller in both England and America. It remains as useful today as when it was written and offers fresh and practical advice on how to make the most of the daily miracle of life.
author: Arnold Bennett
